article.title: October 06, 2014 Galaxy Distribution
article.content:
**[Complete News Brief](http://wiki.galaxyproject.org/DevNewsBriefs/2014-10-06)**

*Highlights:*

• New! [UseGalaxy.org](http://usegalaxy.org) Admin Reorganized
• New! History and Dataset Functions
• Learn about [TACC's](https://www.tacc.utexas.edu/) Stampede supercomputer, a compute powerhouse behind [Main](/src/main/index.md)
• Join our [GitHub](https://github.com/galaxyproject/tools-devteam) community
• Server Status a click away [http://status.galaxyproject.org](http://status.galaxyproject.org)
• Many other Admin, Workflow, Tool Development, Visualization, API, and Job upgrades
• Tunings and Bug Fixes

   getgalaxy.org
galaxy-dist.readthedocs.org
bitbucket.org/galaxy/galaxy-dist
new: $ hg clone https://bitbucket.org/galaxy/galaxy-dist#stable
upgrade: $ hg pull
$ hg update latest_2014.10.06

*Thanks for using Galaxy!*
[The Galaxy Team](/src/galaxy-team/index.md)
